title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.AutoSelect
description: Gets or sets whether to automatically select all or only specific bodies for the extrude feature to affect in the multibody part.
returns: True to automatically select all bodies, false to select specific bodies for IExtrudeFeatureData2::FeatureScopeBodies and IExtrudeFeatureData2::ISetFeatureScopeBodies
remarks:
This property is only available when the
IExtrudeFeatureData2::FeatureScope
property is true.
The extrude feature is expanded along the plane on which the feature is created and selects all or only the specified bodies it intersects.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
